Heading: Largest democracy in the world
Description: India is the largest democracy in the world, with over 1.3 billion people eligible to vote.

Heading: Home to the Taj Mahal
Description: The Taj Mahal is one of the most famous buildings in the world. It is a white marble mausoleum built by Mughal emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his third wife, Mumtaz Mahal.

Heading: Second-largest English-speaking country
Description: India is the second-largest English-speaking country in the world, after the United States.

Heading: Home to the Ganges River
Description: The Ganges River is one of the most sacred rivers in Hinduism. It is also one of the longest rivers in the world, at over 2,500 kilometers long.

Heading: Diverse wildlife
Description: India is home to a diverse range of wildlife, including tigers, elephants, and lions.
